ModMetaData.name: Project RimFactory Revived - Autopsy Machine
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description: ABOUT Adds a machine which can perform autopsies. It works quicker than a human doctor - even faster if you overclock it - and never needs to take a break; not only that, it will even butcher the corpse when it has finished. IMPORTANT NOTICE! In order for this mod to actually do anything, you must have one of the following mods which feature recipes that involve performing autopsies: * Harvest Organs Post Mortem * AutopsyTable (Continued) * Extended Bioengineering for VFE Insectoids CREDITS PRF Team: For their mod and the preview image background Smuffle and dna: For Harvest Organs Post Mortem JuryOfYourFears: Autopsy machine texture
